description: You can update the invoice unit configuration at any time, and Amazon Web Services will use the latest configuration at the end of the month.

parameters.name: InvoiceUnitArn
parameters.description: The ARN to identify an invoice unit. This information can't be modified or deleted.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description: The InvoiceUnitRule object used to update invoice units. LinkedAccounts (list) --- The list of LINKED_ACCOUNT IDs where charges are included within the invoice unit. (string) ---

nested_params.name: LinkedAccounts
nested_params.description: The list of LINKED_ACCOUNT IDs where charges are included within the invoice unit.

nested_items.name: InvoiceUnitArn
nested_items.description: The ARN to identify an invoice unit. This information can't be modified or deleted.
